### R Built-in Function and ggplot2 Graphs

# Introduction

In this assignment, I created 12 graphs using both R built-in graphics functions and `ggplot2`. Each set of charts includes the following types: - Histogram - Vertical and Horizontal Bar Charts - Pie Chart - Boxplot - Scatterplot

For each graph type, I used both **R's built-in functions** and **`ggplot2`**, with customized styles. Finally, I exported the graphs in various formats: `.pdf`, `.jpg`, `.svg`, `.tiff`, and `.bmp`.
